Name: Sigewinne
Title: "Wondrous Dragonheir" Sigewinne
Source: Reward for inviting Sigewinne to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

K53.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Prepare Skill</color>|s1:<color=#FFFFFFFF>prepares</color>
K53.Desc: Some Skills cannot be used directly. Instead, they need to be <color=#FFFFFFFF>prepared</color> over a certain number of turns.\nWhen it is a certain player's turn, and this player's active character is currently <color=#FFFFFFFF>preparing</color> a Skill, this player's turn will be skipped. If the Skill has finished being <color=#FFFFFFFF>prepared</color>, the character will directly use that Skill at this time. (Skills that require <color=#FFFFFFFF>preparing</color> cannot activate effects triggered by "using a Skill" or "triggering an Elemental Reaction" or other such effects.)\nOnly active characters can <color=#FFFFFFFF>prepare</color> Skills, and if an active character who is <color=#FFFFFFFF>preparing</color> a Skill gets switched off-field, their <color=#FFFFFFFF>preparation</color> will be interrupted.

12134.Name: Detailed Diagnosis, Thorough Treatment
12134.Desc: (Passive) When your character is healed, after the <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C122]</color> attached to them has been completely removed, this character gains 1 extra Max HP. (Up to 3 times per character)\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When you switch to this character:</color>If your side has <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C112101]</color>, -1 to their $[K3], and this character gains 1 $[K310].

C122.Name: Bond of Life
C122.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When the character to which this is attached is healed:</color> This effect will be consumed once for every $[K3] it has to negate 1 HP of healing received. (Cannot negate revives or healing caused by redistribution of HP)\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 1</color> (Can stack, no stack limit).

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.

C112101.Name: Sourcewater Droplet
C112101.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After $[A1210] uses a Normal Attack:</color> Heals $[A1210] for 2 HP. If $[A1210] is your active character, then $[K53]: <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K1020]</color>.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 1</color> (Can stack. Max 3 stacks.)

K53.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Prepare Skill</color>|s1:<color=#FFFFFFFF>prepares</color>
K53.Desc: Some Skills cannot be used directly. Instead, they need to be <color=#FFFFFFFF>prepared</color> over a certain number of turns.\nWhen it is a certain player's turn, and this player's active character is currently <color=#FFFFFFFF>preparing</color> a Skill, this player's turn will be skipped. If the Skill has finished being <color=#FFFFFFFF>prepared</color>, the character will directly use that Skill at this time. (Skills that require <color=#FFFFFFFF>preparing</color> cannot activate effects triggered by "using a Skill" or "triggering an Elemental Reaction" or other such effects.)\nOnly active characters can <color=#FFFFFFFF>prepare</color> Skills, and if an active character who is <color=#FFFFFFFF>preparing</color> a Skill gets switched off-field, their <color=#FFFFFFFF>preparation</color> will be interrupted.

K1020.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Equitable Judgment</color>
K1020.Desc: <color=#D3BC8E>Normal Attack</color>\n(Prepare for 1 turn)\nDeals 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG</color>. If this character has at least 6 HP, then this DMG is increased by 1 and this character deals 1 Piercing DMG to self.

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.

K310.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy</color>
K310.Desc: Characters must consume {SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy to use their Elemental Bursts.\nWhen characters use an Elemental Skill or a Normal Attack, they will gain 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy.
